alert.note: Alert for Castle Country (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 3:19AM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Castle Country. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Take action now to reduce the threat of property damage! Winds this strong will cause holiday decorations, lawn furniture, trampolines, and other unsecured objects to become projectiles and potentially cause property damage. High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. SR-10 between Price and Fremont Junction will see the greatest impacts.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
